params.text: left panel : list of collections and subcollections (list of tags are in the bottom of this panel)
in the middle, the list of all the items available in the selected collection (papers, books, cases reports, chapters, etc.)
on the right panel :  Metadata of the selected(or by default first) item.

This menu appeared in the 7th version of Zotero. 

  • info (list of metadata - default view)
  • abstract (if there is one)
  • attachment (for instance the PDF saved with the reference, but it could be also another document or a link)
  • note (note attached to the reference), if any
  • libraries and collections : location of the titme in the collection and subcollection tree view
  • tags (inherited from the database which you collected the reference from unless you inhibited this feature, can also be manualy added)
  • related : related reference
  • key (when betterbibtex plugin is installed, this button does not appear if you don't use this plugin ; the key identifies each reference in the whole library and can be used to make zotero works with text editors
  • locate : is used to locate the reference in several databases (online, google scholar, library catalog)

file section : 

  • import documents in the library
  • import references
  • add new group library or new feeds
  • ...

Edit :

  • quick copy of a citation
  • advanced search within the library
  • link to main settings

View :

(where you could close or restore panels)

Tools : 

The place where you manage Zotero plugins

Help : 

  • the way to checking it an update exists and dowloading it from there
  • version notes
  • link to forum discussions
  • debug tools

backgroundImageAltText: The zotero dashboard divided in three columns (left : list of libraries, middle : list of items in the selected library, right : list of metadata of the selected item)
